section.title: Introduction
section.p: uses Docker to run tests and generate documentation. Docker's light-weight virualization provides the a good balance between proper OS emulation and performance (especially startup)

A Vagrantfile is provided that contains the complete configuration required to run tests and build documentation. If Vagrant is not suitable then the Vagrantfile still contains the configuration steps required to build a test system.
Note that this is not required for normal operation of .

section.title: Testing
section.p: The easiest way to start testing is with the included Vagrantfile.
section.code-block: cd test vagrant up vagrant ssh
section.p: The vagrant up step could take some time as a number of Docker containers must also be built.
